Description: Round-topped limestone stela decorated with dove within pedimental portico; Greek text between two crossed.
Bibliographic references: Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.208, p.218)
Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.141)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I App:7 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
